fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Each time a person dies, A random player goes missing, and their abilities are copied as locust(40).
- Once per hour, you may use an ability from locust(40).

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You are immune to locust(40).
- Your visitors will all turn into locust (40) unless they have bug repellent.
- Bug repellent is a what staus given by locust (40).
- You cannot be converted or voted by Locusts (40).
-Made with the cooperation of Luka, Bionic, Nub, Squidly, Nitowl, Viri, Rasen, JD

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Convert everyone Including yourself except yourself without yourself Into Locust (40) and die.
